original: Agrell, Olov, kommini&ter, Finspång, f. 15/1/11 i Sala stadsförsaml, Väst-mani. 1., av lärov.adj. 0’skar A. o. Nanna Ekblom. G. 37 m. Margit Sven&son. Barn: Birgitta f. 39, Göran 41, Jan-Olov 43, Erik 46. — Stud:-ex. 29, teol. fil. ex. 31, teol. kand. 36, prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f. Lin-köp. stift 36. Studrres. t. Tyskl. 33 o. 35. Pastoratsadj. i Ukna 36, d :o i V. Ed 36-37, kommin. i Ö. Ed 37, kommin. i Risinge sed. 41.
translated: Agrell, Olov, vicar, Finspång, b. January 15th, 1911 in the parish of Sala, Westmanland. Son of the high school teacher Oscar A. and Nanna Ekblom. Married in 1937 to Margit Svenson, with whom he had four children: Birgitta (b. 1939), Göran (b. 1941), Jan-Olov (b. 1943), and Erik (b. 1946). He passed his upper secondary examination in 1929, his Bachelor of Arts in theology in 1931, and passed his Master of Theology in 1936. He completed his practical theological exam and was ordained for the Lin-köp. diocese in 1936. He studied abroad in Germany in 1933 and 1935. He worked as an assistant pastor in Ukna in 1936 and in West Ed from 1936-1937. He became a vicar in Ö. Ed in 1937 and in Risinge in 1941.

education.name: Upper Secondary Examination
education.description: Studied and passed upper secondary examination in 1929

education.description: Studied and passed Bachelor of Arts in Theology in 1931
